author: SciShow
description:
Send a Cake is a great way to show your loved ones just how much they mean to you! Get 10% off your order by clicking the link and using the code SCISHOW: https://sendacake.com/scishowbirthdays1

Look at a map of the Yucatan Peninsula and you’ll immediately notice it’s lacking a feature that’s pretty common nearly everywhere else on Earth: major /rivers/. So where does all the water go? Turns out it’s hiding beneath our feet. 
 
Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: Why Doesn’t the Yucatán Have Rivers?
